## FormServiceConfig interface

Represents configuration for opening a form with [FormService](./form-sheet.formservice.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FormServiceConfig<TForm extends object, TFormState extends object | null = null, TFormConfig = DynamicForm<TForm, TFormState>, TResult = Immutable<TForm>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [customFormComponent?](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.customformcomponent.md) | Type&lt;FormComponent&lt;TFormConfig, TForm, TFormState, TResult&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The form component that should be rendered. |
|  [formConfig](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.formconfig.md) | TFormConfig | The form config passed to the provided form component |
|  [formState?](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.formstate.md) | Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt; \| Observable&lt;Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Form state required by the form |
|  [fullScreen?](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.fullscreen.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to enable full screen forms on mobile. Defaults to true |
|  [navConfig](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.navconfig.md) | [FormSheetNavConfig](./form-sheet.formsheetnavconfig.md) | Configuration for the top navigation bar on bottom sheet |
|  [submitCallback?](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.submitcallback.md) | (val: TResult) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> Function that executes when form is submitted. |
